price: 82. Jie sakė: „Kai mes būsime mirę ir tapsime dulkėmis bei kaulais, ar mes tikrai būsime prikelti?“
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبۡعُوثُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban waʿiẓāman a-innā lamabʿūthūna
